content.title: This is groundbreaking
content.creator:
RYAN VAUGHN
January 30, 2025
content.content:
We are gonna make this happen
2 Revised Business Objectives
- Create a minimum viable dating platform focusing on core authenticity features
- Implement basic profile verification
- Enable women-led conversations
- Build foundation for future growth
### 1.3 Scope Adjustments
Original Features Maintained:
- Basic profile creation and verification
- Women-initiated messaging
- Simple matching system
- Essential safety features
Features Postponed for Future Versions:
- Advanced personality matching
- Video chat
- Complex recommendation algorithms
- Advanced analytics
## 2. Technical Architecture
### 2.1 Frontend Architecture
#### Simplified Technology Stack
- Framework: React Native (Expo Managed Workflow)
  - Justification: Free to use, reduces development time
  - Single codebase for iOS and Android
  - Extensive free component libraries
#### Core Components
1. Navigation
   - React Navigation (free)
   - Simple tab-based interface
   - Basic stack navigation
2. UI Framework
   - React Native Paper (free)
   - Minimal custom components
   - Focus on essential screens only
### 2.2 Backend Architecture
#### Lean Infrastructure
- Backend: Firebase (Free Spark Plan initially)
  - Justification: Free tier supports up to 50,000 users
  - Built-in authentication
  - Real-time database
  - Free hosting
#### Essential Services
1. Database
   - Firebase Realtime Database
   - Simple data structure
   - Basic querying capabilities
2. Authentication
   - Firebase Auth
   - Email/password login
   - Basic social login
## 3. Development Approach
### 3.1 Team Structure
- 1 Full-stack Developer (3 months): $30,000
- 1 Part-time Developer (3 months): $15,000
- Design work handled by developers using templates
